name: Fidget &Bottle Shooter 3D Game
description:
Devbatch presents this Fidget Shooter & Bottle Ninja 3D Shoot Game. AIM and SHOOT! Modern #1 first person bottle shooter, fidget shooter game that will relax you. The most relaxing fidget spinner simulator and bottle ultimate shooter game. A fidget spinner is a toy that is marketed as relieving stress. It consists of a bearing in the center of a multi-lobed flat structure made from metal or plastic. This amazing shooting game is based on the real life #fidget #spinner gadget.

Bottle Shooter gameplay allows shooting all bottles in the fixed amount of time. so that you become a real Bottle Hunt Master! Every round is harder, than the privious. If you like fun and addictive bottle shooter games.

Take the precise shot and unleash your passion to become elite shooter in the town of this summer. Fidget Shooter & Bottle Ninja 3D Shoot is a free modern shooting game ever on online store.

Fidget Shooter & Bottle Ninja 3D Shoot Game Features:
- Ultra REALISTIC 3D graphics and spinning animations
- Many thrilling MISSIONS
- Bootle shoot Game
- Relaxing gameplay - A FPS Game
- EASY and INTUITIVE controls
- FREE game: play it both on your phone and tablet
- Fantastic FPS shooting missions
- Endless thrill with extreme shooting
- Beautiful HD Graphics
- No In App Purchases
- No Internet required and much more...

Try this Most Legendary 3D Fidget Shooter & Bottle Ninja Shoot Game
